attributes.action: Stop hunting Dears, cows pigs foxes etc:
attributes.additional_details: its incresing and for animal right
attributes.background: stop hunting for the money of greed

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about the hunting of animals, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do about this.

If you want the Government to ban all hunting of animals we could accept a petition requesting this, but you would have to provide your full name.

We have published the following related petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban Trail Hunting: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554497

Ban Slaughter and Breeding of Innocent Animals for food: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556039
